cast.name: 阿德·范·肯彭 Ad van Kempen

introduction: Bob is going to take over the world with his metal. He does not have a band yet but that is not going to stop our hero. With some effort and many frustrations he manages to put together a band called Bonestorm. They celebrate their being together with the local pub owner Theo, who in the meantime has big issues with the mob about serious amounts of money. Bonestorm wants to help Theo, but unfortunately one problem leads to another. When everything fails, and all hope is gone, there is only one way to save Theo and his pub: Metal!
